original_title: Le Chienlit: I giorni del Maggio
overview: In 1968, the Italian Communist Party sent director Luigi Perelli and chief operator Ferruccio Castronuovo to France to film the events of May. Announced by the voice of Léo Ferré singing L'Été 68 during a concert, the film's images trace the origin and development of the French student and workers movement during the months of May and June 1968.
title: Le Chienlit: I giorni del Maggio
